Title: Hanes Sport X-Temp Comfort Mens 4 Pack Boxer Briefs
Description:
Hanes has combined the softness of cotton with the performance qualities you want in these stretch cotton jersey boxer briefs. They're made with Hanes® X-Temp™ technology which is designed to adapt to your temperature for all-day comfort. These sleek, sexy boxer briefs also offer Hanes® Fresh IQ™ advanced odor protection technology that attacks odor-causing bacteria so you feel fresh, even after a rigorous workout. The moisture-wicking fabric keeps you cool and dry, while the Comfort Flex® waistband provides stretchy softness where you need it most. For even more comfort, consider the no-ride-up leg bands that stay smoothly in place and the itch-free tagless styling. These stretch cotton boxer briefs are one of Hanes® best, with comfort built into every stitch. And they're available in a convenient 4-pack.
# Pieces In Set: 4-Pack
Features: Odor Resistant, Breathable, Moisture Wicking, Multi-Pack, Fly Front, Tag Free, Regulate Temperature, Cooling, Comfort Waistband, Antimicrobial

Title: Hanes Freshiq Comfortflex Waistband Mens 4 Pack Boxers
Description:
These Hanes® men's boxers are made from ComfortSoft® cotton or cotton-blend jersey that's soft and sturdy. The experts at Hanes® designed them with a Comfort Flex® waistband that prevents your men's boxer underwear from pinching and binding. Even better, they're made with Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture to keep you cool and dry all day. This men's boxer underwear set is available in multiple size options, so you can choose the one that works best for you.
# Pieces In Set: 4-Pack
Features: Odor Resistant, Multi-Pack, Tag Free, Flat Seams, Fly Front, Comfort Waistband
Fiber Content: 100% Cotton
